"A.D.2028/3/30/13:00": "This indeed... Was beyond my expectations. We didn't expect this case to go that far."
"Not approaching like a gentleman heh. Unfortunately, my job has nothing to do with them, it's about taking that child with me."
"In just one strike... My army's gone!?"
"\"Mother\", this isn't what we talked about. Even if this Irregular's too good, I still have my limits."
"If I charge you for this, it won't be enough. Even if you promise to give me ideas for new technologies, it won't do well with me! Geez!"
"...I'll fight too. No, let me fight with you."
